cnbc.title: Google parent beats on revenue, projects significant AI spending increase
cnbc.summary: Alphabet beat on the top and bottom lines in its fourth-quarter earnings report, and said it expects to significantly increase spending on AI in 2026.

cnbc.title: Hedge funds made $24 billion shorting software stocks so far in 2026 — and they are increasing the bet
cnbc.summary: Hedge funds are increasing their short bets against software stocks, contributing to the brutal sell-off in the space so far this year, according to sources at two major funds on Wall Street.

cnbc.title: Qualcomm stock sinks as memory shortage drags on forecast
cnbc.summary: "We're starting to see that memory is going to define the size of the mobile market," Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon said in an interview.

cnbc.title: AMD falls 17%, posts worst day since 2017 as Lisa Su addresses guidance concerns
cnbc.summary: The CEO said that the data center business has risen from the fourth to first quarter and demand for the company's CPUs is "going gangbusters."

cnbc.title: Snap shares rise on fourth-quarter earnings that beat on sales
cnbc.summary: Snap released on Wednesday its fourth-quarter earnings that beat on sales but missed on revenue guidance.

cnbc.title: Oil prices jump after Trump says Iran supreme leader 'should be very worried'
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump has threatened to launch military strikes on Iran if the Islamic Republic doesn't agree to a deal on its nuclear program.

cnbc.title: E.l.f. Beauty posts earnings beat, raises full-year guidance
cnbc.summary: E.l.f. Beauty said its acquisition of Hailey Bieber's skin-care company, Rhode, contributed $128 million to the company's net third-quarter sales growth.

cnbc.title: A surprising share of homeowners have high mortgage rates. Here's the breakdown
cnbc.summary: About 20% of borrowers have mortgages with a rate over 6%.

cnbc.title: China ramps up threats over Panama Canal ruling that handed Trump a major victory
cnbc.summary: The Panama Canal has been thrust into the middle of a power struggle between the U.S. and China, the world's two largest economies.

cnbc.title: Eli Lilly's GLP-1 growth is only getting started as Novo Nordisk braces for a decline in 2026
cnbc.summary: The split in outlook underscores Lilly's strong position in the obesity market, underpinned by more effective drugs and its direct-to-consumer sales strategy.
